items.title: Knife attacker kills three after smoke bombing Taiwan metro
items.description: The suspect's spree began at Taipei's main metro before he moved to another station nearby.

items.title: Tourists to face â‚¬2 fee to get near Rome's Trevi Fountain
items.description: Visitors who don't live in Rome will have to pay to view the Baroque monument up close from February.

items.title: Australia was seen as a world leader in gun control - Bondi has exposed a more complicated reality
items.description: It introduced stricter gun laws after the 1996 Port Arthur massacre, but some say they now need to be tightened further.

items.title: Putin tells BBC Western leaders deceived Russia
items.description: BBC Russia editor Steve Rosenberg had the opportunity to ask Vladimir Putin about his plans for the future of the country.

items.title: Charlie Kirk's widow Erika endorses JD Vance for president
items.description: Conservatives traded criticims at this year's annual Turning Point USA America Fest conference.
